Interesting in learning more about how to use experimental and analytical
techniques to study algorithms and data structures? Checkout these slide decks
to learn more! Each deck explores a specific topic in connection with chapters
in the book [A First Course on Data Structures in
Python](https://donsheehy.github.io/datastructures/). Finally, make sure to
review the [course schedule](../schedule/index.qmd) for more details about how
these slides connect to various course projects.
